mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Receivership of Willie E. Winters Williams, Married woman under the age of 21 until 08.15.1906
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Receivership of Willie E. Winters Williams, Married woman under the age of 21 until 08.15.1906 Perse Williams, Receiver and husband of Willie E. Winters Williams Mattie J. Moore, Mother of Willie and Petitioner to court to appoint Perse as Willie's Receiver Recorded in the Settlement Book, page 492, of the Floyd County Circuit Court
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
